verses.verse: Then he <S%H7200>showed<s%> me <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> at his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> to <S%H7853>accuse<s%> him.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> you, <S%H7854>Satan!<s%> Indeed, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> you! Is <S%H2088>this<s%> not a <S%H181>brand<s%> <S%H5337>plucked<s%> from the <S%H784>fire<s%>?"

And he <S%H6030>spoke<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to those who were <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5493>"Remove<s%> the <S%H6674>filthy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> from him." Again he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7200>"See,<s%> I have <S%H5674>taken<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5674>away<s%> from you and will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> you with <S%H4254>festal<s%> <S%H4254>robes.<s%>"

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let them <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6797>turban<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>" So they <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6797>turban<s%> on his <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> him with <S%H899>garments,<s%> while the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> by.

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H518>'If<s%> you will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H8104>perform<s%> My <S%H4931>service,<s%> then you will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1777>govern<s%> My <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8104>have<s%> <S%H8104>charge<s%> of My <S%H2691>courts,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>grant<s%> you <S%H4109>free<s%> <S%H1980>access<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> who are <S%H5975>standing<s%> [here.]

<S%H4994>'Now<s%> <S%H8085>listen,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> you and your <S%H7453>friends<s%> who are <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of you â€“ <S%H3588>indeed<s%> they are <S%H376>men<s%> who are a <S%H4159>symbol,<s%> for <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H935>bring<s%> in My <S%H5650>servant<s%> the <S%H6780>Branch.<s%>

'For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> that I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua;<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5869>eyes.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H9466>engrave<s%> an <S%H6603>inscription<s%> on it,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> 'and I will <S%H4185>remove<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of that <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

'In that <S%H3117>day,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H376>'every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of you will <S%H7121>invite<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> to [sit] <S%H8478>under<s%> [his] <S%H1612>vine<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> [his] <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>tree.<s%>' "
